title: Nightclub Shooter Identified
content:
3 News is learning more about a local nightclub shooting that sent three people to the hospital. Investigators have arrested the gunman, identified as 22 year old Jorge Hernandez.
That shooting happened early Sunday morning outside the Bonanza nightclub on Baldwin near Greenwood. Detectives say a group of men began fighting as they were leaving the club when Hernandez pulled out a gun and fired it.
Four people were wounded. Two were hit in the leg. Detectives say Hernandez knew his victims. Hernandez faces charges of aggravated assault with a deadly weapon.
